description: A playful visual pun on 'rolling' by tucking in and leaning forward.
title: Rolling Along
n_1: The person felt a bit stiff after sitting too long.
c1_1: Need to stretch out a bit!
n_2: They decided on a quirky way to loosen up.
n_3: Tucking their knees in, they leaned forward.
n_4: Rolling forward, they couldn’t help but laugh.
